title: 61 Different Champions were played across EU and NA LCS this week
body:
Out of 123 total champions (I'm fairly certain Bard isn't enabled in the LCS yet).

Essentially half of all champions were chosen.
{{champion:103}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:254}}{{champion:112}}  {{champion:8}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:238}} 

Great work on Patch 5.5, Riot.

replies.body: I can't tell if sarcasm or not...

Definitely not sarcasm.

I enjoyed that the games weren't just the same champions over and over again.
besides tanks in solo queue running around full retard its a great patch.

> [{quoted}](name=SavagePenetrator,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=Lf30eEvk,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-23T02:25:15.524+0000)
>
> besides tanks in solo queue running around full retard its a great patch.

lol let them live it up a little, they were under the jungle kings' thumbs for so long they deserve to cut loose

I hope that Riot doesn't change the tanks. We've seen so much diversity in the last week. It is absolutely wonderful! Champions that weren't being played are now viable. IMO, this was just what the game needed.
indeed great work
Kassadin?

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=Lf30eEvk,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-03-23T06:31:15.818+0000)
>
> Kassadin?

EL Froggen played it.
But Kass got nerfed to hell...

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=Lf30eEvk,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-03-23T13:45:50.147+0000)
>
> But Kass got nerfed to hell...

I did not say it worked out, just that it was played by him.
Easily one of the most enjoyable weeks in competitive play I've ever seen.
Bard is weak he will not get played.

> [{quoted}](name=PoisonedTea,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=Lf30eEvk,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-03-23T20:10:10.655+0000)
>
> Bard is weak he will not get played.

...Famous Last words...

We'll see something like that again during this week. No new patch means the LCSs will still be running 5.5.

WHICH IS GOOD.

I'm pretty sure we added like, 20 champions to the mix that rarely saw play outside of player preference.

Urgot. Olaf. Yorick. ZAC. Nautilus SUPPORT (the first champion I Ranked with in the role I used them!). Twitch came back in. Viktor is still seeing some use. Vlad poked his head in. Sejuani is seen as a terror (but that's only because people still aren't quite used to tank yet, and she's top tier in that regard).

And Urgot needs a second mentioning. Urgot. UR-GOHT. Urgot Mid wrecked TSM.

No one expects, the Urgod inquisition.

... I couldn't resist. I'm sorry.

No one RESISTS the Urgod Inquisition either!

(Unless they build a lot of armor/HP)
One day... One day, Lordekaiser will show you all.
It is pretty great. A Golden Age.

> [{quoted}](name=RndmInternetMan,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=Lf30eEvk,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-23T02:17:04.890+0000)
>
> Out of 123 total champions 
> 
> Essentially half of all champions were chosen.

> Great work on Patch 5.5, Riot.

Well IDK about the patch is all good because it  caused new potential problems with Tank abuse alas esp vs the champions you didn't list...

Seeing more champions is/are better.

Now if we can just get the *rest* of the game onboard that would be nice...

BTW nice work on the research.
Yeah I was down to playing LoL only a few times a week prior to 5.5 and now Im back to every day, game is so much better.
Can someone link me to the Diana game? Been trying to find it, but don't know which game it was in.

Gambit vs MYM
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6euQ3HNNFUU
except... I don't think patch 5.5 is the one they are playing on... Could be wrong, don't follow those tournies too closely.
they're on 5.5, all the tanks were using Cinderhulk in the jungle, not Juggernaut.
